data.title: Intermedia Games—Games Inter Media: Video Games and Intermediality 9781501330490, 9781501330520, 9781501330513
data.meta_description: While all media are part of intermedial networks, video games are often at the nexus of that network. They not only empl...

PART ONE Video Games’ Incorporation of Other Media

8 Edgar Allan Poe Simulators: On Dream Logic, Game Narratives, and Poesque Atmospheres

9 Interference as Artistic Strategy: Video Game Art between Transparency and Opacity

PART THREE Video Games and Their Transmedia Environments

10 Music across the Transmedial Frontier: Star Trek Video Games

11 Transmediality and the Brick: Differences and Similarities between Analog and Digital Lego Play

12 Transfictionality, Thetic Space, and Doctrinal Transtexts: The Procedural Expansion of Gor in Second Life’s Gorean Role-playing Games
